content.name: Cox Enterprises
bullets: Spearheaded the development of robust features on websites that receive hundred of thousands of visitors monthly using React, Arc Publishing CMS, and hooks.
Worked closely with design team in modernizing the user experience and responsive interfaces for AJC.com and sister-sites.
Collaborated with stakeholders and vendors in ensuring time-sensitive features where deployed before deadlines.
Developed paywalls, ad-blocker checks, and subscriber initiatives that increased digital revenue for AJC.com.

content.name: Cox Communications
bullets: Developed and styled landing page, dashboards, and multiple UI components using Angular, TypeScript, and SASS for an enterprise Spring Boot application.
Collaborated with onshore and offshore teams in identifying and resolving issues within the application.

content.name: Pixel Smash
content.desc: Online fighting game powered by Node and Phaser where you win by knocking your opponent off stage.
bullets: Designed and programmed all combat mechanics for fast paced action
Spearheaded the creation of the CPU combat logic for ‘player vs computer’ battling in single-player mode.
Designed the Sound Test feature that show-cased music from the game.

content.name: Ad-Vision
content.desc: Augmented Reality Mobile Application that allows users to take snapshots of objects and uses cloud-based machine learning services to return relevant information on the object images taken.
bullets: Developing all text, meshes, and particle emitter components that would render when triggered by animage marker.
Created reusable classes for ViroReact’s particle system that streamline particle effects development
Constructed chained animations that brought the 3D components to life and greatly improve the user experience.
Utilized: JavaScript, ViroReact AR, React Native, Node, Express, Google Cloud Vision

content.name: Georgia Institue of Technology
bullets: Designed, developed, and deployed numerous robust web applications utilizing front and back-end technologies such as MongoDB, Express, React, and Node (MERN Stack).
Developed applications that were awarded special recognition such as “Most Creative” and “Best UI/UXDesign”

content.name: University of Georgia
bullets: B.B.A in Risk Management and Insurance, May 2016.
